item.title: Getting started with OpenTelemetry Metrics in .NET. Part 2: Instrumenting the BookStore API
item.description: In this 2 part series-post I’m going to show you how to use OpenTelemetry to generate custom metrics and how to visualize those metrics using Prometheus and Grafana. In part 2 I’ll be showing you how to add OpenTelemetry Metrics on a real life .NET app and how to visualize those metrics using Prometheus and Grafana.

item.title: Getting started with OpenTelemetry Metrics in .NET. Part 1: Key concepts
item.description: In this 2 part series-post I’m going to show you how to use OpenTelemetry to generate custom metrics and how to visualize those metrics using Prometheus and Grafana. In part 1 I’ll be talking about some key concepts that you should know when using OpenTelemetry Metrics with .NET.
